##Chapter 3, Example 3.3


###Install
```{r, echo = TRUE}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

###General
```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
setwd("C:/Book/Chapter3/Examples")
data <-read.csv(file="Ex3.3.csv",head=TRUE,sep=",")
# Basic line plot
p<- ggplot(data = data, aes(x = data$Time..s, y = data$Temperature..C))+
  geom_line(color = "#00AFBB", size = 1)+xlab("Time, s")+ ylab("Temperature, °C")
p
```

###With loess smoother
```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
setwd("C:/Book/Chapter3/Examples")
data <-read.csv(file="Ex3.3.csv",head=TRUE,sep=",")
# Basic line plot
p<- ggplot(data = data, aes(x = data$Time..s, y = data$Temperature..C))+
  geom_line(color = "#00AFBB", size = 1)+geom_smooth(method="loess")+xlab("Time, s")+ ylab("Temperature, °C")
p
```
